website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung ATIV Book 9 Lite entry-level DTR laptop has a great looking design, but with mediocre performance, it's all sizzle, no steak.
cons: Miserable performance from Samsung's mystery processor

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slow. Don't be fooled by the "quad-core processor".
customer_reviews.text: Extremely slow. The Quad-core 1.4GHz processor is actually an old AMD mobile processor and it makes everything other than browning with a few tabs open painfully slow. There are better options in this price range, including tablets that would be actually much faster than this product. You cannot expand the 4GB memory either. As a net-book for browsing and writing while travelling it would work great, but then again there are better options at this price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fabiano

customer_reviews.title: I love my husband and kids a lot
customer_reviews.text: I love my husband and kids a lot. But this Samsung comes closely behind. I can't fault it. Instantly turns on (ie great for meetings and 10minutes work catch up here and there), battery is superb more than 12 months on, double hard drive so can split work and personal storage, never lets me down and looks smart. Finally carrying my laptop to and from work does not ruin my shoulder; this is a perfect laptop for a commuter/ regular traveler. I shopped around to find the perfect model and pleased I did; this laptop is utterly superb.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Beat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 5 years, used heavily throughout my uni degree and then just for personal use once I graduated. Battery only started to go after 3 years, now works for just over an hour without being plugged in. Can't really ask for more at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this laptop. It is so light and compact with is perfect for me. I use it for running a small business and for emails and internet shopping. It is perfect for this. It doesn't have a disc drive so all files must be put onto an external pen drive. I don't play games or listen to music on it. Great price for a little lap top.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Little Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little laptop. Quick to use and navigate, beautiful to look at. Touchscreen facility works well. Initial set up (including downloading Microsoft office software) took a while mainly due to a load of updates required. A present for daughter's 14th birthday with the intention of giving her something to use for her GSCE years and also for the normal essentials like YouTube, Facebook and Snapchat and it seems to be ideal for all those uses. Very happy so far with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stay Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: great value for money laptop
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light weight laptop tor travelling and this fits the bill, only need it for surfing and emails so it does that perfectly. very light weight, only had it for 1 week so not had a great deal of use. connects to wifi home and abroad no problem. first time I've had windows 8 so trying to get used to it. like others say the mouse pad can be a bit sensitive which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: russ

customer_reviews.title: Light and fast laptop
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a laptop to take on holiday so I could download photos on the run. It had to be light and this one is. Very good picture quality and very fast. The only downside is that it only has a relatively small hard drive of 120gb (100 usable). I was really impressed with speed of delivery - it arrived two days after ordering and well before the target date.
customer_reviews.author: Stig294

customer_reviews.title: The battery lasted only just over a year. Seems ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery lasted only just over a year. Seems it had a timebomb waiting for the warranty to expire. Now it only works plugged into the power supply. Not what I expected after the price I paid for a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good value buy and light. For most things its performance is fine, but you'd not want it if you were a games player. The solid state hard drive helps the performance but with only 128Gb I do need to reply on cloud storage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: In love with my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It was delivered on time as expected. Laptop is very light which is awesome for someone always traveling. System was windows 8.0 but got automatically upgraded to 8.1 yesterday. It does what i need it to do: work from Microsoft office and listening to music. Nothing advanced and i'm happy about it. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: MissPoly

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product but weak processor kills it.
customer_reviews.text: Laptop looks great! Very tiny, light, nice designed. Unfortunately hardware is not good enough. Processor is too slow - not only too slow for current standards, it's too slow to use even Windows 7... It makes whole laptop slow af.
customer_reviews.author: Artur Sandelewski

customer_reviews.title: Nice bit of kit..
customer_reviews.text: Nice bit of kit, delivery was excellent. Only bug bear - It obviously had a very basic or very dated copy of windows 8 installed and took ages for all the updates (approx 90) to install before ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop, everything is good about it... using it now to write this review. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pearcerjjr

customer_reviews.title: Now updated to Windows 10 is much better.
customer_reviews.text: Was pre loaded with rubbish Windows 8. Now updated to Windows 10 is much better.
customer_reviews.author: betterthantv

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: very light and it looks lovely in white, windows 8 is a pain but i am getting used to it. good batery life and hardely gets hot at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Trak pad is not great at all but I love the laptop overall
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a present. It went down well, and is in daily use.
customer_reviews.author: CorrezeChris

customer_reviews.title: Great all round laptop
customer_reviews.text: Lovely laptop at a very good price. Its perfect for the whole family as the kids love the touchscreen but we can still work on it too.
customer_reviews.author: LucyR

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months of light use and no abuse whatsoever ...
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of light use and no abuse whatsoever the screen has stopped working- the right half of the screen does not display anything. An OK laptop otherwise, but feels a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Geddis

customer_reviews.title: so useful for daily use
customer_reviews.text: so useful for daily use. I can bring it everywhere I go. very thin and light, fast enough. I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Erdem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Good functionality. Used by a 11 year old and sometime by dad!
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and smart. I would
customer_reviews.text: Quick service. Lovely value for money computer. Lightweight and smart. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jill Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money, the touch screen is worth it
customer_reviews.author: John D. E. Waterson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed about 3 days of updates doing to it but otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.author: Robin Crawley

customer_reviews.title: No probs
customer_reviews.text: Thin, light-weight, the ssd is fast and it performs ok for office apps.
customer_reviews.author: John Field

customer_reviews.title: Fab little ultrabook.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking, light and easy to use ultrabook. I don't like Windows 8 but with the 8.1 download it makes it easy to use. It has all the functions I'm used to in a laptop and goes like a little dream. You get around 5 hours battery life and it takes only seconds to boot up too. I have no complaints with this little one.
customer_reviews.author: Helenaswt.

customer_reviews.title: A cracking MacBook Air alternative.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for a notebook computer. I live the quick start-up and thinness of it. The downside of having the solid state drive is the reduced storage but with cheap external drives available it's an easy compromise to make.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon M

customer_reviews.title: Great value and looks the part
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good looking laptop, perhaps a little plasticy but that's expected at this price point. Boots quickly into windows 8 and the touch screen works well and doesn't interfere with the quality of the display. In operation the laptops nice and quiet, nippy enough for simple tasks and the battery life appears to be as advertised. Performance won't blow you away, but you'd need to spend a little more if you need a high powered laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Quirk

customer_reviews.title: entry level
customer_reviews.text: very bad performance. dont be fooled by the quad core spec, by opening more than 3 tabs in internet explorer or firefox the cpu peaks 100%. speakers sound quality is poor as well. very entry level.basic machine. light tho may suite those needing a quick start and light machine like commuters or so.
customer_reviews.author: marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Lacks capacity to run even the simplest of tasks
customer_reviews.text: The device is well designed, extremely light, well priced and very stylish. However, with just 4 GB Ram the laptop struggled to run Windows 8 and do anything else. I had a small number of tabs open in Google Chrome and it couldn't handle that relatively small task; standard internet pages took ages to load. I have returned the item and purchased an alternative device.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its just perfect for me. I mostly used HP before this Samsung ATIV Book 9 Lite! Performance is really good, starts within 8 secs. Well, the hard disk space is not that much but I do consider that its SSD, so, I don't mind its 128GB. Very lite and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Rajin Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: 1 issue
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and good graphics but on occasion it has reset itself while in use or the screen while go black and have to reload everything that was open on the page (particularly while watching videos) which I have been told is due to it being an AMD processor which has a few issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, and fantastically fast...ideal for sixth form work and university study. Really like the design and build quality, looks robust
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Andrea Lovick

customer_reviews.title: Samsung
customer_reviews.text: all perfect with the Samsung laptop! The lead time was a bit delayed by 3 days compared to what has been promised!!
customer_reviews.author: Helmut Grafe

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight in price and weifgt
customer_reviews.text: Quality laptop light in weight but with heavy performance. at a good price. Responsive and fast performance.A pleasure to take with me whrerever I go
customer_reviews.author: Victor Max Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer and Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this computer and makes windows 8 fun and easy to use because of the touchscreen. The seller was fantastic and extremely helpful. I would completely recommend this computer to friends and family and would purchase from the seller any day. They were just fantastically helpful and quick to respond. Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah T. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop.. a good buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this laptop...sleek design ,good performance..very fast and light...less than 2kg...touch screen very sensitive...would reccomend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Maria Buttigieg

customer_reviews.title: A good machine with Windows 8 - what could go wrong?
customer_reviews.text: I needed a Windows OS to work with Excel files - Linux and LibreOffice simply wasn't coping. I chose Windows 8 on a machine without a touch screen which was the dumbest idea imaginable. I started by getting rid of Samsung bloat ware, installed Office and away I went. Battery life is good and the size of the machine makes it impressively portable. It ticks so many boxes for me that I would like to give it 5 stars. But it has Windows 8. After a few years of trouble free Linux use, this feels like a return to the Dark Side
customer_reviews.author: Phil Renouf

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: don't bother, the seller was ok, refunded fully but the product was plasticky and horrible
customer_reviews.author: srilankandoodle

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant little laptop..
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger and better than you would think in the flesh; feels like a laptop not a net-book, in both size and performance. Plenty fast enough, tons of memory and good features. To me, it is user friendly and I found it easy to setup. I like the fact you can personalise everything, it is a nice touch. I have read some comments about the fact it feels "plasticy", I've not found this at all, it feels no different from an Apple Mac. Good value for the money and I would recommend it to another person should they have a realistic budget of around £500/600.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I was spend a long time to looking a laptop, and now I found it, this is amazing and easy to use just one problem is I don't like windows 8 :)
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: No good review is possible
customer_reviews.text: No good review is possible. bad box arrived, damaged by the way. Laptop damaged. This product was a Christmas gift, very very disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: José Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: very good value for its specifications, but beware this is not an Intel Processor. Samsung give no indication of who makes the chip, so must assume its either an Amd chip or Samsungs own. Had I known this , I would have paid a little more to have an Intel chip.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ankers

customer_reviews.title: Light and compact
customer_reviews.text: We do like this computer but the screen does tend to switch off on its own which is a pain. It was too difficult to return as my son could not be without a computer and if we wanted to get a refund may have to lose 15% of the value.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Truely awful laptop. Looks great but that is the only redeeming feature, plus possibly that it is fast to boot and wake from sleep. It is slow clunky and does not work well with windows 8 or 8.1. upgrade. Please do not waste your money there are plenty of much cheaper, faster and more useable laptops out there.
customer_reviews.author: Cjm

customer_reviews.title: I do not understand how it being purchased because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand how it being purchased because I would never buy second hand item. It was a mistake
customer_reviews.author: Alice Baptista

customer_reviews.title: Blue screen of death
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. OK looking laptop for the price. Touchpad feels a bit plasticy but what do you expect for this price. Windows 8 however is a pile of junk. Auto update kicks in.98 updates to install. Then on restart it fails and hangs on blue screen now. Can't even start in safe mode.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Williams

customer_reviews.title: ***DO NOT BUY***
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop as a replacement for my Dell Inspiron which lasted 10 years and because I was moving to Canada indefinitely. Within 10 days of purchase the laptop will not turn on and is permanently stuck in 'sleep' mode. Now I am abroad trying to start a new life with this piece of junk laptop and potentially a long wait to get this repaired. I urge you not to buy this. Invest in an iMac. This kinda stuff shouldn't happen to a brand new laptop and I am extremely angry and upset at Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hodson

customer_reviews.title: buu
customer_reviews.text: very bad laptop, i did sell it with lost but my old one works much faster then this one, wast of money
customer_reviews.author: Piotr Wroblewski

product_meta.title: Samsung ATIV Book 9 Lite 13.3-inch Touchscreen Laptop - White (Quad Core 1.4GHz, 4GB RAM, 128GB SSD, LAN, WLAN, BT, Webcam, Integrated Graphics, Windows 8)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
